title: [搬运]Xaiwakerv2.2 Winter16x材质 1.1版本
author: JedBoy_LD
txt_content:
Xaiwaker Winter Edition

Xaiwaker是一款非常不错的16x材质，也是在很久就有的一个非常经典的材质，那么这次就被老D在Planet上看到了，因为他已更新至2.2冬季版本，【看清楚是冬季哦！】兼容MineCraft的1.1版本，因为源下载是MF所以被墙掉了的说，所以就在这里帮大家一个忙喽！【这么好的材质必须和大家分享的塞！】XD

一样是搬原文过来：
Xaiwalker winter edition is here! Its available for Minecraft 1.1, and is only available in the standard definition of 16 by 16.

Xaiwalker winter edition is here. Theres snow on the ground snow on the trees snow everywhere for this winter edition texture pack. The pack keeps to the same style as other Xaiwalker texture pack editions which the rich colours and the inspiration from Zelda. But now its winter!

Xaivern has done a great job updating this pack and making a winter edition. Its cold out side theres snow on the floor. So why not in Minecraft! Great job and thanks for brining this to the community.

How to install XD

Download Xaiwaker Winter Edition Texture Pack
Ensure you have a up to date version of Minecraft
Open .minecraft /texture packs
Drag the texture pack into /texture packs
Close out of the windows
Open Minecraft
Select your pack and enjoy!
【其实也可以看懂嘛……实在是笨的童鞋就去用有道喽……】
源帖地址：http://www.planetminecraft.com/t ... ker-winter-edition/
源下载地址：http://www.mediafire.com/?8ajm6tf43amgz5p
115网盘下载地址：
资源:115网盘附件下载:Xaiwaker_V2.2_-_Winter.zip (3.33MB) 
给予个别人士→各位伸手党们自重，不留言留名也行= =

祝您游戏愉快！爱MineCraft！爱这个世界！
                                                                                           ■2012/2/12

replies.author: jacky1440
replies.txt_content:
1.Download Xaiwaker Winter Edition Texture Pack
 2.Ensure you have a up to date version of Minecraft
 3.Open .minecraft /texture packs
 4.Drag the texture pack into /texture packs
 5.Close out of the windows
 6.Open Minecraft
 7.Select your pack and enjoy!

1.下载“Xaiwaker" 冬季纹理包包
2.确保你的Minecraft是最新版（1.1）
3.打开窗口“.minecraft /texture packs”
4.把“Xaiwaker" 冬季纹理包”扔到“.minecraft /texture packs”里
5.关掉窗口
6.打开Minecraft.jar
7.打开“texture packs”
8.点击“Xaiwaker" 冬季纹理包

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content:
我不是伸手黨，但是我也不是會想裝材質的那種...
太習慣原版的了，不過還是感謝老D搬運~

replies.author: HQT
replies.txt_content: 就二图？？  支持一下吧，，

replies.author: jacky1440
replies.txt_content:
jacky1440 发表于 2012-2-11 16:51 
1.Download Xaiwaker Winter Edition Texture Pack
 2.Ensure you have a up to date version of Minecraf ...
还要前面。。。难；；
==============================
Xaiwalker冬季版就在这里！可以在1.1 Minecraft使用，标准清晰度16。
这个世界上的树木或地面都积满了雪，包包保持丰富的色彩和灵感来其他Xaiwalker纹理包版本相同的风格。但现在是冬天！
xaivern已经做完伟大工作，更新包和冬季版。其冷落一边。这个世界地板上的积满了雪。那么，为什么不在Minecraft！伟大的工作和感谢社会。
==============================
就这样= =。。

replies.author: MineCraftNerd
replies.txt_content: 16X，负担不是很大。现在64X都带不起了= =
虽然拿走伸手。但我得留名。感谢楼主的分享~~
